response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. I am now extending to you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you can secure this valuable asset at a favorable rate while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
